mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM channel WHERE id = #{channelId}

SELECT channel.channelKey, channel.id, channel.name, channel.followerCount, channel.imageUrl, COALESCE(COUNT(favorites.channelKey), 0) AS favoriteCount ,
CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM favorites f JOIN userConnection uc ON f.userKey = uc.userKey WHERE f.channelKey = channel.channelKey AND uc.sessionId = #{sessionId} ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isFavorite FROM channel LEFT JOIN favorites ON channel.channelKey = favorites.channelKey WHERE channel.id = #{channelId} GROUP BY channel.channelKey

SELECT c.name, c.imageUrl, c.id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM post p JOIN channel c ON p.channelKey = c.channelKey WHERE p.createdAt BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY c.channelKey, c.name, c.imageUrl ORDER BY post_count DESC LIMIT 0, 10
SELECT * FROM channel ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 7;
